reviews.review: Absolutely the best game for speedruning :D
The hype is very real. This game still looks great and plays great, once you get past the boring first levels it gets very interesting very fast.
Makes you test stuff in test chamber.

Classic. Never go on your journey without a towel. And a crowbar.
Game still holds up good to this day the level design is great! and the enemies and guns feel well balanced to use the story is interesting in my opinion
great game , thanks to summer sale , i got it for almost nothing damn aint this game good
Classic Valve game. Black Mesa may have fancy graphics, but this is still worth playing because the gameplay's different; in my experience HL1 can be played more aggressively.
what can i say, classic is classic, 10/10.

Muy buen juego, buena historia y muy caro pero vale la pena :)
This game is a must play. Don't let the 1998 graphics deter you from playing one of the greatest first person shooters of all time.

amazing, great fun, cant stop playing

One of the most classic and timeless first person shooters. Steam version is a little botched compared to the original CD release but it's not a big deal. Can't go wrong with this.
half life 1 is the best video game ever made
Still just as good as when I first played it about 20 years ago, and all the user-made maps and mods out there could last you a lifetime.
This game will always stand the test of time, truly an iconic experience.
игра прикольная, всегда хотел пройти первую часть

WEEHEE HEH HAHAHAH AAAHHH HA HA HA BAHAHA
ИГРА ШИКАРНА! Была и будет. Half Life всегда будет эталоном качества.

Классика жанра - два, наиболее подходящих под описание данной игры, слова. Помню как играл в это еще когда был малым. Благодаря этой игре также появились моды, которые переросли в более крупные проекты и в них мы до сих пор играем. Half life - революционная игра своего времени, за что достойна полученных наград. Не знаю, читает ли кто-то мой на*** никому не нужный обзор, но я хочу сказать одно... эта игра БЕССМЕРТНА.
Flows  better than I thought it would and your a speed demon in a track suit.....what more can you ask for?
虽然是老游戏但是相当好玩，唯一的槽点就是接近一半的时间都在和各种管道打交道，一直在爬通风管走水管。这一点让我想到了蝙蝠侠的阿甘系列，游戏手感让我想到了英雄萨姆和永远的毁灭公爵，感觉很类似，爬管道难道是一个相当流行的设计？
